Ghandhy Engg College

http://www.ssgc.cteguj.in/

Lecturer

I worked as Lecturer in Ghandhy Engineering College, India. It is a technical college with a demonstrated commitment to excellence in faculty teaching. I taught courses such as Machines and Transformers, Fundamentals & Analysis of Electrical Power System and Utilization of Electrical Power.

The Clovis Group LLC

The Clovis Group

Designer & Developer

I designed and developed the website from inception to implementation for The Clovis Group LLC using HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Javascript and jQuery. I maintained code and manually tested site in various browsers and devices to ensure cross-browser compatibility. I made sure my client and their customers have responsive and coherent user experience.
